data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Haute-Marne, Grand Est, France.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Haute-Marne, Grand Est, France
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Haute-Marne, Grand Est, France. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.section_summary: On average, 20 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Haute-Marne, Grand Est, France.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, 192,200 people live in the county of Haute-Marne. Please, give them 38 new simple churches this year.
Spirit, help the church in the county of Haute-Marne do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Nogent-le-Bas
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Nogent-le-Bas, Grand Est, France.
Jesus, please help the 2,362 believers in the county of Haute-Marne to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Haute-Marne, Grand Est, France.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary:
the county of Haute-Marne, Grand Est, France has a population of 192,200.

We estimate Haute-Marne has 2,362 people who might know Jesus, 117,534 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 72,304 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 81 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the county of Haute-Marne prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.
